name: Wildlife Matters
description:
Embark on a captivating global adventure as a young ranger, dedicated to rescuing captured animals. Your noble quest leads you to awe-inspiring locations - forgotten caves, ancient temples, rare safaris, wild jungles, and breathtaking waterfalls. But hold on tight, as that's just the tip of the iceberg!



EXPLORE CONTINENTS

Take your journey to new heights as you traverse mysterious Asia, discover the exotic wonders of Africa, and marvel at the beauty of North America. Each continent presents unique puzzles, challenges and surprises, adding layers of excitement to your wildlife-saving adventure.

PUZZLE CHALLENGE

Engage your intellect with our next-gen puzzling experience. Solve hundreds of innovative puzzles that will test your skills and unravel the mysteries of each location. Are you up for the challenge?

STUNNING RETRO ATMOSPHERE

Immerse yourself in a world of tranquility and beauty with stunning visuals and authentic audio. Feel the environments come to life as you navigate through serene landscapes on your mission to make a positive impact.
